name: Mini Sugar Eye Palette
about: What it is:An essential mini eyeshadow collection featuring nine full-pigment shades, from cool-toned neutrals to icy pastels in matte and metallic finishes...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This palette contains nine eyeshadow shades from soft neutrals to bright sparkly tones, in five mattes and four metallic finishes. The full-pigment formula delivers high color payoff and buildable intensity..This Palette Contains:

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use a light hand when picking up product; because the formula is full pigment, a little bit goes a long way. .-To apply eyeshadow, use a flat brush to deposit color, highlight, or pack eyeshadow onto the lid. .-Use a fluffy-ended brush to diffuse and blend out shadow. .-For a more intense color payoff, pair metallic shades with a setting spray. .-Use the matte and metallic eyeshadows as highlight shades. .-Use the warm matte-neutral eyeshadows for contouring and defining, and the warm- and cool-metallic eyeshadows as accent shades. . ..Pro Tips:.-For a more intense color payoff, pair the metallic shades with a setting spray. .-Create a gradient smoky eye look using a cool-tone shade for contouring and a warm-tone shade for blending out. .-The contrast between the warm and cool tones come together to create a high-impact eye look. .-Use any of the bright shades as a cheek color. .-Use the deeper matte shades to define the lash line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow palette, it‚Äôs nice and compact with a variety that all goes well together. I use the matte pink + brown shade everyday and the glitter  for some pizazz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4 of the most glittery shadows from the set were simply smeared across the packaging, very fragile shadows for further use and impossible to store them all the colors together - mix - matte with glittery shadows

I used this beautiful palette for Christmas and I loved the colors. I love the fact that it has matte and shimmery colors. I hardly ever wear eyeshadow and much less color. But with these beautiful colors I wanted to experiment. I was not disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's so cute and blends great. I've been using only nudes up until now and I wanted to try a little bit of color recently. I recommend.

reviews.review_title: A must have for everyday routines or dressing up
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love  this mini sugar eye palette!!  The colors are absolutely stunning and easy apply.  Anastasia never fails me with stunning pallet colors and easy to apply finishes.  I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much, soo pigmented, doesn't run out, and the colors are stunning. The glitter stays on your skin no matter how much you sweat!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is smooth good! The mattes blend smoothly and the shimmers are amazing with no fallout! This is amazing on my cool toned skin!  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: these sparkles are IT! Best applied with a finger > brush for ideal colour pay off. So gorgeous for the holidays, I fear I‚Äôll be hitting pan on that middle row by NYE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect shadow pallet for the holidays. The blue reminds me of a winter wonderland I absolutely love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The palette is beautiful and the color are the ones a use often

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs a good little palette. Everyone knows by now to use glitter glue for certain shades, but you can do all matte looks too. The glitters have a beautiful shift. I‚Äôve gotten compliments on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not a good palette. I expected more from ABH. the metallics BARELY have pigment and it‚Äôs so hard to get out. These are not easily blendable either, I don‚Äôt recommend this product and Im returning this.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful colors, but some issues with fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors of this palette and the matte shades go in really well. I really appreciate the cool toned neutrals. The sparkle shades are stunning but some (especially the blue) have a lot of fall out and don‚Äôt cover well.  I think this palette is worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador and this is my honest review and opinion. I really like the price of this little palette, and I was drawn to this color story. This I think would be an excellent beginner palette or make a nice gift. Out of the 2 releases, I'm surprised I like the Spice palette more, but this one has more fun and stand out shades. I'm really happy I picked up these little palette's and they've been fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm underwhelmed.  There's fallout.  Blending is a challenge. It took considerable time reworking my look with both the sugar and spice palettes to come up with something presentable.  I still wasn't happy but this had to do. And surprisingly, the colours just do not go well, at all.  The dark glitters are VERY hard to blend.  I bought this palette specifically for the green glitter and blue glitters and, as you can see, even with white primer it's very underwhelming.  You either get a huge blotch of green that doesn't spread or you get sheer sparkles, literally everywhere.  I used one ply of a tissue under my eyes to remedy this.  I don't recommend these palettes for hooded eyes like mine unless you have a LOT of time and unlimited brushes because you will need to blend, blend, blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I initially was worried that I'd hate the sequin shades. However, both sequin shades in this palette perform and blend like a dream, the shimmers are gorgeous and the mattes are pigmented and easily blendable. This type of color story usually looks a little bruisey on me, but these colors don't, which was a nice surprise. I highly recommend this palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The whole palette has a purplish tint. The middle color from the very top looks purple. Then the store didn‚Äôt comply with Sephora return policy. I should‚Äôve gotten a gift card that I could use online, but I received a store credit. This is after I returned the eyeshadow in a brand new condition two days after I received it by mail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: got this for my bf who is new to makeup and the shimmer shades are gorgeous! they‚Äôre a little more chunky than the urban decay shimmer so it creates a magical effect instead of a watery texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so conflicted on buy this, because I dont need another eyeshadow palette.. BUT THE PINK.. the pink glitter duo chrome shade is the most GORGEOUS highlighter on the cheeks. I bought it soley to use the pink as a highlighter. Worth it. The other shades are good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful! The prettiest palette I‚Äôve ever seen. The matte formula is great and I love just how glittery the shimmer and glitter shades are. The price point is good too if you‚Äôre looking for a higher end palette that isn‚Äôt expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This little pallet is so stunning without being over the top. The colors are great on their own or in any combo. No wonder it's selling out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who prefers a more subtle nude matte eye look, this palette seemed scary. However every shade is so beautiful and wearable, especially if you have cool toned features, it‚Äôs absolutely wonderful

reviews.review_title: He is sending me a replacement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, this palette is a dream. It‚Äôs so gorgeous especially the blue. But unfortunately, my pallet came shattered especially the blue. I called customer service and Caleb was very helpful. Hsending me out another pallet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven‚Äôt bought an ABH palette since the big Norvinas launched but this caught my eye and I‚Äôm so glad I got it!!! The mattes perform effortlessly, and the shimmers are really pretty and don‚Äôt crease on me!! Hoping to see more like this from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colours in this one and the sparkle is gorgeous! Lost a star for having the blue shade arrive broken. I was able to scrape it all out and do the rubbing alcohol trick and put it back in the pan...was able to save about half...phew!

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but glitter shades are a mess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice palette, but as another reviewer said, the blue broke during shipping and covered everything in the box in blue glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish the palette was a 14 pan palette for a couple more shades. But I really liked the look I was able to create.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a stunning eyeshadow palette! Beautiful formula, very creamy and the glittery shades are so iridescent! Very happy with the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH a beautiful eyeshadow palette üòç. Not only is the colourway so beautiful, but the shadows are soft, creamy and easily blend-able.  So happy with this purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blue colour came in the mail and it was broken! Wish they would package these pallets better for shipping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the most beautiful and perfect small eyeshadow palette I have ever seen.  The shades are gorgeous, and the number of variety of looks available is fantastic for its size.  The blending is easy, the textures are lovely, and on top of that there is no fallout (not an exaggeration).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this palette so much, the colors are so pretty together or on their own. It‚Äôs a nice size and would be good for traveling. Would also make a nice gift for someone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette has really nice colours and the formula is perfect and lasts long. I think this is worth purchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this palette because the shimmery shades feel so Y2K to me. And it didn‚Äôt disappoint!! The colours are so subtle yet striking in the right light. They catch the sun beautifully. I didn‚Äôt notice any fallout throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful pallet, perfect balance of neutrals and shimmer shades but none of that matters when it arrived with the blue broken and a complete glittery mess. As soon as I opened the sephora box I noticed traces of blue glitter and new I was doomed. All this to say, I'm still tempted to find one in store that is not broken. If you want to try this palette, I recommend you do this same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a big eyeshadow girly. I rarely find palettes with colours I love but this is perfect! The colours are beautiful, amazing pigment and blend-ability. Each colour is rich and has long lasting power. It‚Äôs compact and perfect. Get it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing quality! I easily bendable, good pigmentation and I love square shape. Will be perfect for traveling too. I got both pallets (Sugar and Spice) I‚Äôm in love‚Ä¶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color story. ABH doesn‚Äôt disappoint. Great quality and color payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colors in this palette so much as soon as it dropped it was on my radar of something I HAD to pick up. Beautiful as expected, in love with every aspect. I appreciate the inclusion of both metallics and mattes that have glitter specs. Only thing is to be wary around watery parts of your eyes it tends to crease and come off in those areas  even with primer but I made it work.
